theorem lean_workbook_plus_21 (n p q : ℕ) (hp : p ≤ n) (hq : q ≤ p) : (n - q).choose (p - q) * n.choose q = n.choose p * p.choose q   := by
  simp [choose_mul, hp, hq, mul_comm, mul_assoc, mul_left_comm]

hq : q ≤ p
⊢ n.choose q * (n - q).choose (p - q) = n.choose p * p.choose q

theorem lean_workbook_plus_45 :
  (5^(2*1) ≡ 25 [MOD 100])   := by
  conv => lhs; rw [← Nat.mod_add_div 5 100, ← Nat.mod_add_div 5 100]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_56 : sin (π / 4) = cos (π / 4) ∧ sin (π / 4) = 1 / Real.sqrt 2 ∧ cos (π / 4) = 1 / Real.sqrt 2   := by
  refine ⟨?_,?_,?_⟩ <;> field_simp [Real.sin_pi_div_four, Real.cos_pi_div_four]

text:
theorem lean_workbook_plus_52 : ∀ x : ℝ, Real.cos (2 * x) ^ 2 = (1 + Real.cos (4 * x)) / 2   := by
  simp [cos_sq, sin_sq, sub_eq_add_neg, add_assoc]
  exact fun x ↦ by ring

theorem lean_workbook_plus_40 :
  ∀ θ : ℝ, 0 < θ ∧ θ < Real.pi / 4 → Real.cos θ > Real.sin θ   := by
  intro θ h₁
  rw [← cos_pi_div_two_sub, ← sin_pi_div_two_sub]
  rw [Real.sin_pi_div_two_sub]
  exact cos_lt_cos_of_nonneg_of_le_pi_div_two (by linarith) (by linarith) (by linarith)
errors:
unsolved goals
θ : ℝ
h₁ : 0 < θ ∧ θ < Real.pi / 4
⊢ Real.cos θ > Real.sin θ
